name: Morphcat Games Collection 1
storyline:
Micro Mages
Morphcat’s chaotic 8-bit action platformer comes to Evercade, with support for up to four players on Evercade VS! Can you and your fellow Micro Mages conquer the Demon Fortress?

Micro Mages: Second Quest
Micro Mages: Second Quest is a standalone expansion for Micro Mages, bringing an all-new 8-bit challenge for you and up to three friends to Evercade.

Böbl
In Böbl, you are an 8-bit bubble. Water is your friend and solid tiles will kill you! Challenge this unusual exploration-centric platformer on your Evercade and save the missing duckies!

Spacegulls
Spread your wings and fly in this 8-bit platformer for your Evercade. Can you track down your missing chicks and fend off Dr. Beak’s evil cyborg bird army?

Super Bat Puncher
Morphcat’s classic 8-bit demo from 2011, now on your Evercade. Delve into the depths of planet BAT in search of the truth behind the explosive space bats that invaded the Earth!
summary:
The Morphcat Games Collection 1 features 3 fantastic 8-bit indie games including Micro Mages, Böbl and Spacegulls, plus standalone expansion Micro Mages: Second Quest and the Super Bat Puncher Demo.

- Micro Mages
- Böbl
- Spacegulls
- Micro Mages: Second Quest (untagged)
- Super Bat Puncher Demo.
